science.name: B.Tech / B.E. (Engineering)
science.description: Four-year undergraduate program in various engineering disciplines like Computer Science, Mechanical, Civil, Electronics, etc.
science.comparison: Unlike B.Sc., B.Tech focuses on practical application and building things rather than pure science research.

science.name: MBBS (Medicine)
science.description: Five and a half year program to become a doctor, including one year of internship.
science.comparison: MBBS is for becoming a practicing doctor, while BDS is for dentistry and B.Pharm is for pharmacy.

science.name: B.Sc. (Science)
science.description: Three-year undergraduate degree in pure sciences like Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, Biology, etc.
science.comparison: B.Sc. focuses on theoretical knowledge and research, while B.Tech emphasizes engineering applications.

science.name: B.Pharm (Pharmacy)
science.description: Four-year program focused on pharmaceutical sciences, drug development, and healthcare.
science.comparison: B.Pharm is about medicines and drugs, different from MBBS which is about treating patients directly.

science.name: BCA (Computer Applications)
science.description: Three-year undergraduate program focused on computer programming, software development, and IT.
science.comparison: BCA is shorter than B.Tech CS but focuses specifically on software and applications, not hardware.

business.name: B.Com (Commerce)
business.description: Three-year undergraduate degree covering accounting, finance, taxation, and business fundamentals.
business.comparison: B.Com is more focused on accounting and finance, while BBA covers broader management skills.

business.name: BBA (Business Administration)
business.description: Three-year program covering management principles, marketing, HR, and business operations.
business.comparison: BBA provides broader management education, while B.Com is more specialized in accounts and finance.

business.name: CA (Chartered Accountancy)
business.description: Professional course in accounting, auditing, and taxation conducted by ICAI.
business.comparison: CA is a professional certification with higher earning potential than regular B.Com graduates.

business.name: BBA LLB (Integrated Law)
business.description: Five-year integrated program combining business administration with law degree.
business.comparison: Combines business knowledge with legal expertise, unlike standalone BBA or LLB programs.

business.name: B.A. Economics (Hons)
business.description: Three-year program studying economic theories, policies, and market analysis.
business.comparison: Focuses on economic theory and policy analysis, while B.Com is more practical accounting-focused.

arts.name: B.A. (Arts)
arts.description: Three-year undergraduate program in humanities subjects like History, Political Science, Sociology, etc.
arts.comparison: B.A. offers flexibility across humanities subjects, while specialized degrees focus on one field.

arts.name: B.A. English (Hons)
arts.description: Three-year program focused on English literature, language, and communication skills.
arts.comparison: More specialized in language and literature compared to general B.A. programs.

arts.name: B.A. Psychology
arts.description: Three-year program studying human behavior, mental processes, and therapeutic techniques.
arts.comparison: Focuses on understanding human mind, unlike sociology which studies society as a whole.

arts.name: B.A. History
arts.description: Three-year program studying historical events, civilizations, and their impact on modern society.
arts.comparison: Focuses on past events and analysis, good for civil services and museum work.

arts.name: B.A. Foreign Languages
arts.description: Three-year program learning foreign languages like French, German, Spanish, Japanese, etc.
arts.comparison: Provides specialized language skills for international careers unlike general humanities.

design.name: B.Des (Design)
design.description: Four-year undergraduate program in various design disciplines like product, fashion, or interior design.
design.comparison: B.Des is more comprehensive than diploma courses and recognized for professional design careers.

design.name: BFA (Fine Arts)
design.description: Four-year program in painting, sculpture, applied arts, and visual arts.
design.comparison: BFA focuses on traditional fine arts, while B.Des is more industry and product-oriented.

design.name: BJMC (Journalism & Mass Communication)
design.description: Three-year program covering journalism, advertising, public relations, and media production.
design.comparison: Focused on media and communication, unlike B.A. which covers broader humanities.

design.name: B.Sc. Animation & VFX
design.description: Three-year program in 2D/3D animation, visual effects, and game design.
design.comparison: Technical creative field combining art with technology, unlike pure fine arts programs.

design.name: B.Sc. Film Making
design.description: Three-year program covering direction, cinematography, editing, and film production.
design.comparison: Hands-on filmmaking skills, different from BJMC which covers broader media theory.

law.name: BA LLB (Integrated Law)
law.description: Five-year integrated program combining arts with law degree for comprehensive legal education.
law.comparison: Integrated program saves time compared to doing BA and LLB separately.

law.name: LLB (Law)
law.description: Three-year law degree for graduates who want to become legal professionals.
law.comparison: Shorter than integrated law but requires prior graduation in any field.

law.name: UPSC Preparation (Civil Services)
law.description: Preparation for India's premier civil service examination for administrative roles.
law.comparison: Not a degree but a career path requiring graduation and dedicated preparation.

law.name: B.A. Public Administration
law.description: Three-year program studying government functioning, policies, and administration.
law.comparison: Specifically designed for those interested in government jobs and civil services.

vocational.name: B.Sc. Hotel Management
vocational.description: Three-year program covering hospitality, hotel operations, food service, and tourism.
vocational.comparison: Degree program with better prospects than diploma courses in hospitality.

vocational.name: B.Sc. Nursing
vocational.description: Four-year program in nursing science and healthcare for becoming a registered nurse.
vocational.comparison: Degree nursing has better career growth than GNM diploma nursing.

vocational.name: Aviation Management / Cabin Crew
vocational.description: Short-term to diploma courses for airline and airport jobs.
vocational.comparison: Quick entry into aviation industry without lengthy degree programs.

vocational.name: ITI (Industrial Training)
vocational.description: Certificate courses in technical trades like electrical, mechanical, plumbing, etc.
vocational.comparison: Practical skill-based training for immediate employment in technical fields.

vocational.name: Paramedical Courses
vocational.description: Diploma and degree programs in medical lab technology, radiology, physiotherapy, etc.
vocational.comparison: Healthcare support roles with shorter training than MBBS or nursing degrees.

science.name: JEE Main
science.description: National level entrance exam for admission to NITs, IIITs, and other engineering colleges.
science.importance: Gateway to top engineering colleges in India. Required for JEE Advanced eligibility.

science.name: JEE Advanced
science.description: Entrance exam for admission to IITs, India's premier engineering institutes.
science.importance: Only way to get into IITs. Requires clearing JEE Main cutoff first.

science.name: NEET UG
science.description: National entrance exam for MBBS, BDS, BAMS, and other medical courses.
science.importance: Single entrance exam for all medical colleges in India including AIIMS.

science.name: BITSAT
science.description: Entrance exam for BITS Pilani and its campuses.
science.importance: One of the best private engineering institutes with excellent placements.

business.name: CUET UG
business.description: Common University Entrance Test for admission to central universities.
business.importance: Single exam for admission to 40+ central universities including DU, JNU, BHU.

business.name: IPMAT
business.description: Integrated Program in Management Aptitude Test for IIM Indore and Rohtak.
business.importance: Direct entry to IIMs after 12th through 5-year integrated program.

business.name: SET (Symbiosis Entrance Test)
business.description: Entrance exam for Symbiosis International University programs.
business.importance: Required for admission to all Symbiosis colleges for BBA, B.Com, etc.

business.name: CA Foundation
business.description: Entry level exam for Chartered Accountancy course conducted by ICAI.
business.importance: First step to becoming a Chartered Accountant.

arts.name: CUET UG
arts.description: Common entrance test for arts and humanities programs at central universities.
arts.importance: Gateway to top universities like DU, JNU, BHU for BA programs.

arts.name: DU JAT
arts.description: Delhi University Joint Admission Test for BMS, BBA, and B.Com (Hons) programs.
arts.importance: Required for management programs at Delhi University.

design.name: NID DAT
design.description: Design Aptitude Test for National Institute of Design admissions.
design.importance: NID is India's premier design institute with excellent industry connections.

design.name: NIFT Entrance
design.description: Entrance exam for National Institute of Fashion Technology programs.
design.importance: Top institute for fashion and textile design in India.

design.name: UCEED
design.description: Undergraduate Common Entrance Exam for Design at IITs.
design.importance: Entry to B.Des programs at IIT Bombay, Delhi, Guwahati, and Hyderabad.

law.name: CLAT
law.description: Common Law Admission Test for National Law Universities.
law.importance: Gateway to 22 National Law Universities across India.

law.name: AILET
law.description: All India Law Entrance Test for National Law University Delhi.
law.importance: Separate exam for NLU Delhi, one of the top law schools.

law.name: LSAT India
law.description: Law School Admission Test accepted by many private law colleges.
law.importance: Internationally recognized test for law school admissions.

vocational.name: NCHMCT JEE
vocational.description: Joint Entrance Examination for Hotel Management colleges.
vocational.importance: Required for IHMs and other government hotel management institutes.

vocational.name: NEET UG (for B.Sc Nursing)
vocational.description: Some states use NEET scores for B.Sc Nursing admissions.
vocational.importance: Alternative pathway to nursing in government colleges.

vocational.name: State ITI Entrance
vocational.description: State-level entrance tests for Industrial Training Institutes.
vocational.importance: Required for admission to government ITIs with lower fees.
